page.title: 10Shopping Centre_Willenhall
page.content: The Market Place, Stafford St. and Cross Streer make up the main shopping area of Willenhall. The area has recently bee pedestrianised with exclusion of all traffic from these streets except for access, designed to improve safety for Willenhall shoppers. There are about 120 retail outlets most of which serve the everyday needs of the local community, illustrated by the number of food shops. A tradional market is held on Wednesday, Friday and Saturday each week. Surveys showed that people using the shops either lived or worked in the imediate area, found the amenities adequate. A one way traffic system operates in the streets immediatly adjacent to the central shopping area designed to ease the traffic flow, since many of the streets are narrow.
